name: DIE.ce
description:
30th GM48 (Ranked 11/59) Theme: No Death State

This game was an entry for the 30th GM48. 

View original submission here: https://gm48.net/game/1242/die-ce

The Jam Version of the game is the exact same as the one on the gm48 page.

Story

Your girlfriend has been kidnapped! Solve Puzzles and die a lot. Trust me... A LOT!

Controls WASD   Moving Space Jump E Interact Holding R for a few secondsRestarts LevelALT + Enter Toggle Fullscreen
Credits Programming WinuX Graphics SwissPick Audio WinuX Level Design & Story SwissPick & WinuX
